titles.title: Ensuring Medicaid Eligibility Act of 2025
Ensuring Medicaid Eligibility Act of 2025

To prohibit implementation of the rule entitled "Medicaid Program; Streamlining the Medicaid, Children's Health Insurance Program, and Basic Health Program Application, Eligibility Determination, Enrollment, and Renewal Processes", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
